TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit OutputFileReference extends System.Object

Docs.summary: A reference to a task or job output file in persistent storage.

Docs.summary: Gets a reference to the underlying object representing the file in persistent storage. This can be used to invoke blob methods or overloads not surfaced by the abstraction.

MemberSignature.Value: public string FilePath { get; }
.property instance string FilePath
Public ReadOnly Property FilePath As String
member this.FilePath : string

Docs.summary: Gets the path under which the file was stored.
Docs.remarks: If the file was stored under a directory path, the FilePath property uses the directory separator of the underlying blob storage (for example, mydirectory/myfile.txt). Such paths may not be directly usable as Windows paths.
